data.eml:eml: Larval morphology of Plagiosterna adamsii (Baly) and P. aenea (Linnaeus) with resurrection of Gastrolinoides Chûjô & Kimoto and P. formosana (Bates) (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Chrysomelinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cho, Hee-Wook, Świętojańska, Jolanta (2017): Larval morphology of Plagiosterna adamsii (Baly) and P. aenea (Linnaeus) with resurrection of Gastrolinoides Chûjô & Kimoto and P. formosana (Bates) (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Chrysomelinae). Zootaxa 4236 (2): 381-391, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4236.2.12
